addr: 153-10 Jamaica Avenue New York, New York 11432
title: 2nd Annual Beauty&Brains Conference
desc: The Beautiful Butterfly, Inc hosts its 2nd Annual Beauty&Brains Conference on Saturday November 28th, 2015 at the Jamaica Performing Arts Center 9am-4pm. "Go Be Phenomenal" is this years conference theme created by the "butterflies" of the organization is specifically organized and design for young women and aims to shatter the stereotypes of what the media and the world at large considers to emcompass what beauty is (or is not). In addition, the conference also aims to shine a light on how important it is to nuture one's intellectual beauty. Partiticipating this year is a dynamic young women panel of speakers that will expound on what it take to "Go Be Phenomenal" in their fields and interest. If you are a young women or if you have a daughter, sister, niece or friend in your life you'll want to be at this conference!!
